body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Hilltop Hotels. My name is Justin Hill. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Katherine Garcia.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Katherine. Could you please provide me with your reservation number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven eight nine zero six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Katherine. Can you also confirm your check-in date for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My check-in date was three one zero three two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate the information, Katherine. I will look into the issue regarding your noisy neighbors. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Justin. I've been feeling disappointed about the situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Katherine. We strive to ensure all our guests have a comfortable stay. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting Hilltop Hotels, Katherine. If you need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Justin. I appreciate your assistance. Goodbye.
